**free pattern as a crochet-a-long on my blog ** ** read the introduction post 1 ** part one ears and head - ** visit post 2 ** part two arms and tail - visit post 3 part three feet and body visit post 4 part four dress and bows 28 march 23 this crochet-a-long for britney the bunny will be staying on the blog written pattern for an amigurumi long-ear bunny this bunny is a minimal sewing pattern you will only be sewing on the head ears and bows the legs are worked up from the bottom to the body and place the arms in as you sew them ******************************************************************************************************* crochet level intermediate- you will need to know how to read a pattern and have attempted amigurumi before crocheting in the round pattern details - this rabbit is 30cm/11 8inches if used with recommended yarn - this is a fully written pattern with some links to my youtube channel for tips & tricks - the pattern is only available in english us term crochet - you will be working in rounds - the pattern itself consists of 8 pages all these pages are printer-friendly - this pattern explains how to attach the head and arms i used moya 100% double knit what you will need crochet hooks 3 5mm double knit / light worsted weight yarn colour a bunny 66g colour b inner ears 10g colour c bows and dress 18g black and white cotton thread for the nose and eyes scissors stuffing 12 mm safety eyes optional stitch marker tapestry needle long & short toywasher joints or pair of extra safety eyes or four buttons and strong thread copyright please keep this in mind you are welcome to sell your finished toys but the pattern and images contained in this document are the property of yarn over with natasha this pattern is for personal use only you may not share any part of this pattern with others via email or on social media platforms all rights are reserved on this pattern this pattern may not be altered in any way *without my permission* to create a different character to create your own patterns or sell please credit the designer yarn over with natasha when sharing your finished toy on social media ** happy crocheting ** please leave a favorable review on my shop or tag me on instagram @yarnoverwithnatasha any questions please don t hesitate to send me a message i m more than happy to help with quick responses 1 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2023/03/01/britney-bunny-free-cal-introduction-post/ 2 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2023/03/07/long-ear-bunny-britney-free-crochet-a-long-part-one 3 https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/2023/03/14/britney-bunny-crochet-a-long-part-two-free-pattern 4 https // type elementor siteurl https //yarnoverwithnatasha co za/wp-json/ elements id 8ac8ff3 eltype widget isinner false islocked false settings editor
